info.description:
Most expansion fans are familiar with the idea of a magic-growth ray or a Master PC. It's a fantastic device, given to one lucky bastard, with the ability to alter others' sizes, proportions, and, occasionally, their minds.

This is one of those stories.

Unlike those stories, the main character is a contestant in a game run by an unseen pervert. They'll have to use their newfound power, skill, intelligence, and creativity if they don't want to be the next target of their competitors' empowered fetishes.

What is encouraged:
Breast expansion/ass expansion
Weight gain/muscle gain
Giantess/shrinking
Low-tier monster girl stuff.

Please avoid:
Scat/golden showers/etc.
Character death (including lethal vore targeting unnamed characters)
Excessive amounts of futa.
Needless gore or otherwise disgusting material.
One-sentence/one-paragraph entries that only say that "X character grew to Y cup size" or "X character grew to Y feet tall."

Also, please avoid excessive choice-trees. Nobody needs to choose every possible combination of characters and changes that they undergo.

--------------

Some basic notes for the competition:

1. Each competitor starts off with a ray gun that follows the rules of science-fiction ray guns. It fires a fast, but dodgeable beam that is affected by mirrors.

2. Each ray gun starts off with only one possible manipulation. For instance, one could start off capable of growing others' breasts, whereas another can make other people smaller.

3. With each successive hit on a target, a contestant gains "experience points" which they can use to gain new powers on their guns, reverse changes made to them, or generally make the game easier for them.

4. I would prefer it if the main characters' opponents were selected from existing contestant, but feel free to make up new contestants to suit your desires if need be.

Our competitors are:

1. Tara Michaels: a short, mousy librarian. Cunning, creative and bears a hidden perverted streak she's reluctant to let out.

2. Lindsay Crowe: a curvy Instagram influencer. Charismatic, reasonably athletic, and egomaniacal.

3. Paula Jameson: a thick-set housewife and former heartthrob. Reasonably bright, able to blend into a crowd, shockingly creative.

4. Tanya Morris: A triathlete with rigorous self-discipline. Fast, strong, none too bright.

5. Any character of your choice.

Let the games begin!
